long_description: Thule Hull-a-Port kayak carrier has J-shape cradles for easy loading and transporting. Custom mounting hardware fits Thule bars, round bars and most aftermarket and factory installed racks. Designed to fit kayaks up to 34 in. wide and 75 lbs. Carrier features adjustable padding to gently cradle and protect your boat. Angled design allows more room for other boats or other carriers on cross bars. Includes all ratchets, straps, ropes and hooks needed for securing and transporting 1 kayak.
short_description: Thule Hull-a-Port kayak carrier has J-shape cradles for easy loading and transporting.
